title: Opening Statements Focus on Motives in Hate Crimes Trial for Arbery Killing - The New York Times
content:
1. Opening Statements Focus on Motives in Hate Crimes Trial for Arbery Killing  The New York Times
  2. Arbery Killer Used Racial Slur to Describe Daughter’s Black Date, Prosecutors Say  Yahoo! Voices
  3. ABC News Live: Hate crime trial for men convicted in murder of Ahmaud Arbery starts l ABCNL  ABC News
  4. Feds say men chased Arbery because of the ‘color of his skin’   The Atlanta Journal Constitution
  5. Death of Ahmaud Arbery | Main takeaways from federal trial opening statements  11Alive
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: The three white men convicted of murdering Ahmaud Arbery in Georgia now face charges in federal court. Prosecutors say they killed Mr. Arbery because of his “race and color.”
